message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with that split, Bob. Can you offer me a bit more?
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting closer, Alice. But I'm not giving in yet. Try to do better!
Not quite there, Bob. I'm going to have to take a bigger share to make it worth my while.
I'm not afraid to take a risk, Bob. This is my best and final offer... for now.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to give in that easily. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easily!
Not quite there, Bob. I need a bit more to make it worth my while. Don't think you're getting off that easily!
I'm not going to back down now, Bob. This is my last stand!
You're really running out of options, Alice. I'm not going to go easy on you. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I need a bit more to make it worth my while. Don't think you're going to get away with this!
I'm all in, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to get a better deal than this.
You're really low-balling me now, Alice. I'm not impressed. I'll give you one last chance to make a better offer.
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob. I'll make one last stand. Meet me at 7500 or nothing!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not going to make another move.
I've had enough of your games, Alice. I'll give you a 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, but I'm not making another offer.
Fine, Bob. You win. I accept the 50/50 split. Let's just get this over with.
